typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProviderUKPRN as string,
		CourseId as string,
		LearnAimRef as string,
		CourseName as string,
		DeliveryMode as string,
		FlexibleStartDate as boolean,
		StartDate as string,
		CourseURL as string,
		Cost as string,
		CostDescription as string,
		National as boolean,
		Regions as string,
		VenueId as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		DurationUnit as string,
		DurationValue as string,
		AttendancePattern as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> courses
source(output(
		Id as string,
		LocationAddress1 as string,
		LocationAddress2 as string,
		LocationCounty as string,
		LocationLatitude as double,
		LocationLongitude as double,
		LocationName as string,
		LocationPostcode as string,
		LocationTown as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	query: 'SELECT  c.id as Id\n       ,c.VENUE_NAME as LocationName\n       ,c.ADDRESS_1 as LocationAddress1\n       ,c.ADDRESS_2 as LocationAddress2\n       ,c.TOWN as LocationTown\n       ,c.COUNTY as LocationCounty\n       ,c.POSTCODE as LocationPostcode\n       ,c.Latitude as LocationLatitude\n       ,c.Longitude as LocationLongitude                                                 \nFROM c',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> venues
courses split(not(isNull(VenueId)),
	not(isNull(Regions)),
	National,
	disjoint: false) ~> splitByLocationType@(CoursesWithVenues, RegionalCourses, NationalCourses, UnknownLocation)
splitByLocationType@CoursesWithVenues, venues join(VenueId == Id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinVenue
joinVenue, splitByLocationType@RegionalCourses, splitByLocationType@NationalCourses union(byName: true)~> joinCourses
joinCourses sink(input(
		ProviderUkprn as string,
		CourseName as string,
		CourseId as string,
		LearnAimRef as string,
		DeliveryMode as string,
		StartDate as string,
		FlexibleStartDate as string,
		CourseURL as string,
		Cost as string,
		CostDescription as string,
		Regions as string,
		National as string,
		LocationName as string,
		LocationAddress1 as string,
		LocationAddress2 as string,
		LocationTown as string,
		LocationPostcode as string,
		LocationLatitude as string,
		LocationLongitude as string,
		UpdatedDate as string,
		DurationUnit as string,
		DurationValue as string,
		AttendanceType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['courses.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> coursesExport
